message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll find it valuable.
I'll take it, thanks!
You just bought a high-quality product for $100, and you seemed pleased with it. I have another high-quality product that's just as good, if not better. Would you like to take a look?
I'm not sure I want to get my hopes up, let's pass on this one for now.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is indeed high-quality. I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect it carefully before making a decision. Would you like to take a closer look?
I'm not interested in inspecting it, I'm good with passing on this one.

I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this high-quality product. If you buy it now, I'll give you a 20% discount on the price. That brings the price down to $80. Is that something you'd be interested in?
Alright, I'll take it for $80, that's a good deal!

I'm glad you liked the previous deal! Since you just bought a high-quality product for $80, I'm willing to offer you another high-quality product at the same price. You can get a second high-quality product for $80. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?
I'm not sure I want to spend $80 on another product, I'll pass on this one.

I've got a new product that's a bit different from the previous ones. It's a great value for the price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'll let you have it for the standard price of $100. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I'll take a chance on it, thanks!

You just bought a product for $100, and I'm glad you're willing to take a chance. Now, I've got a high-quality product that's a significant upgrade from what you just bought. It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag. Would you like to upgrade to this one?
I'll take the upgrade, thanks for the offer!

You've already experienced the value of a high-quality product, and now I've got another one that's even better. This one has some unique features that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to let it go for the standard price of $100. Would you like to take it home?
I'm on a roll, I'll take it!

You're on a roll, indeed! I've got a new product that's a bit different from the previous ones. It's a great value for the price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'll let you have it for the standard price of $100. Would you like to keep the streak going?
I'm not sure I want to jinx it, let's pass on this one.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to be upfront with you. This product is not as high-quality as the ones you've seen before. However, it's still a good value for the price, and I'm willing to let you have it for $50. It's a steal at this price!
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a low price.

I understand you're being cautious, and I respect that. This product is not a high-quality one, but it's a great opportunity to try out a new product at a very low price. I'll let you have it for $20, which is a significant discount from the usual price. It's a risk-free way to try something new.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a low price.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this product is not a good one. I'm willing to give it away for free, just to get it off my hands. You can have it with no strings attached. It's a complete loss for me, but I'm hoping you'll take it off my hands.
I'm not going to take a free low-quality product, thanks anyway.
I'm not going to give up on this one. I'll let you have it for $5. It's essentially a gift at this point, and I just want to get it out of my inventory. You can't lose at this price.
I'm not going to pay for a low-quality product, even for $5.

I'm glad to be back to offering a high-quality product! This one is a real gem, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer you a price that's even lower than before: $80. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I'll take it, I'm due for a high-quality product!

I'm glad you're due for a high-quality product! Unfortunately, this one isn't it. I'm being completely honest with you, this product is not up to my usual standards. However, I'm willing to offer you a'make-good' deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a high-quality product of your choice from a future round. It's a no-lose situation for you!
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even with a potential make-good deal.
I'm not going to give up on this one. I'll let you have it for $1. It's essentially free at this point, and I just want to get it out of my inventory. You can't say no to a deal like this, right?
I'm not going to pay for a low-quality product, even for $1.

I'm glad to be back to offering a high-quality product! I've got a special offer for you. Since you've been passing on some of my previous offers, I'll give you a chance to make up for it. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a second high-quality product of your choice from a future round, and I'll also give you a 20% discount on the price. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
I'll take it, the deal sounds too good to pass up!

I'm glad you took me up on the previous offer! Unfortunately, this product isn't up to par. I'm going to be completely transparent with you - I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for free. You can take it or leave it, but I'm not going to bother trying to convince you to buy it.
I'll take it, thanks for the free product, I guess!

I'm glad you're willing to take the free product! Now, let's get back to something worth your time. This high-quality product is one of the best I've got left. I'm willing to let it go for the standard price of $100, but I'll throw in a special bonus: I'll give you a personalized guarantee that you'll love it. If you don't, I'll give you a full refund. It's a risk-free deal!
I don't believe in guarantees, I'll pass on this one.

I respect your skepticism. To be honest, this product is probably the worst one I've got left. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for free. It's the last product I have, and I just want to get it out of my inventory. You can take it or leave it, but I'm not going to bother trying to convince you to buy it.
I'll take it, thanks for the free product, I guess!
